author: pgoldstein
msg: Changed the JDBC connection pool code to set the thread state to normal
before releasing the thread back to the pool.

author: hbedi
msg: InternetPrintWriter can be used. No need for another CRLFPrintWriter

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fixed an auto flush bug in InternetPrintWriter.
Prior to this change, the InternetPrintWriter always
flushed, whether the auto flush was set to true or
false.  It also didn't keep the lock on the stream
between the print and the flush, contrary to contract.
